column1:
New Yorkers, when you feel that random drop of liquid on your head while you're walking on a non-rainy day, what's the best case scenario?


Options include:

* Bird feces

* Human spit

* Air conditioning coolant

* Something dripping from a fire escape

* ????


And why does this happen so frequently?

What do you do on a day off?


During the week I often want to go explore the city instead of working. But when I actually have a day off, it's hard to think of creative ways to fill it. I usually just wind up having lunch at a good diner and walking around places I already know. 

What are some of your favorite things to do on a City Day?

Does anyone else feel as if everyone in NYC does cocaine?
